story: It was sunrise in Oldstones,  when our hero met Robert Baratheon again, and they fought in the final battle. Arya Stark won the duel but spared the life of the villain. Finally it was the Summer Solstice in Seagard when Arya Stark was finally safe, and celebrated with Catelyn Stark by throwing a ball.
